descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jerami Grant weaves around the defense and crams home the two-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Grant maneuvers in lane, flushes dunk) 2021/04/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Grant maneuvers in lane, flushes dunk

videos.description: Caris LeVert rips the ball away from Cory Joseph and cruises in for the layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeVert picks the pocket of Joseph then scores the layup) 2021/04/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeVert picks the pocket of Joseph then scores the layup

videos.description: Miles Plumlee thinks he has the easy dunk, but Oshae Brissett comes out of nowhere to swat it straight down.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Brissett sends Plumlee’s dunk attempt right back where it came from) 2021/04/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Brissett sends Plumlee's dunk attempt right back where it came from

videos.description: Caris LeVert goes baseline and contorts his body for a sweet reverse layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeVert gets fancy on reverse) 2021/04/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeVert gets fancy on reverse
